mapper.select: select movie_id as "movieId", movie_title as "movieTitle", movie_category as "movieCategory", movie_score as "movieScore", opening_date as "openingDate", closing_date as "closingDate", running_time as "runningTime", movie_director as "movieDirector", movie_synopsis as "movieSynopsis", performer as "performer", is_adult_movie as "isAdultMovie", movie_poster as "moviePoster" from movie where movie_title = #{movieTitleFinal}
